forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 71F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 42F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies with gusty winds developing later in the day. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. Becoming windy late. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 4C. NW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 42F. NW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
